channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Threads is developing a tool that lets you ‘tag’ its algorithm to configure your feed
item.description: Threads is developing a new feature that would let users control what they see by 'tagging' the algorithm.

item.title: 12 Best Cheap Laptops (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From surprisingly good $300 Chromebooks to excellent $650 Windows laptops, these are the best budget laptops we’ve tested.

item.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Pulse to proactively write you morning briefs
item.description: Subscribers to ChatGPT's $200-a-month Pro plan will get to try out Pulse, OpenAI's latest agent product.

item.title: 25 Best MagSafe Accessories (2025): Qi2 Chargers, Magnetic Wallets, and More
item.description: The weird, wonderful world of MagSafe accessories (Qi2 included) can make your phone feel modular. These are our favorites.

item.title: Tesla asks EPA not to roll back emissions rules as Trump calls climate change a ‘con job’
item.description: The company's regulatory policy team is trying to clean up a mess that CEO Elon Musk spent $300 million to help create.

item.title: AllTrails Hiking App Review: Outdoor Planning and Navigation
item.description: Forget the wads of paper maps—AllTrails keeps everything you need to plan your outdoor trip on your phone.

item.title: Spotify denies recent accusation that it changed its terms for artists
item.description: Spotify sets the record straight about the distribution rights of artists, podcasters, creators, and authors on the platform.

item.title: Chromebooks vs. PC: The Differences Between Chrome OS and Windows
item.description: If you're trying to decide between a Chromebook and a Windows laptop, some recent changes have shaken up how these two platforms compare.

item.title: Juicebox raises $30M from Sequoia to revolutionize hiring with LLM-powered search
item.description: The recruiting startup has over 2,500 customers, including recruiters at Perplexity, Ramp, and OpenAI.

item.title: The 29 Best Movies on Apple TV+ Right Now (September 2025)
item.description: Highest 2 Lowest, Deaf President Now!, and Number One on the Call Sheet are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Apple TV+ this month.
